title: Forecast of lanthanum oxide price globally 2009 to 2025
yAxis: Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton. In total the number of data points it has is 17.
Overall Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton has increased over the Year.
Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton is gradually increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly decreasing from 2011 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2025.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton, about 98757.0 was reported at Year 2011
Minimum Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton about 4604.0 was reached at Year 2009

max_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton. In total the number of data points it has is 17.
Overall Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton has increased over the Year.
Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton is gradually increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly decreasing from 2011 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2025.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton, about 98757.0 was reported at Year 2011
Minimum Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton about 4604.0 was reached at Year 2009
The line rapidly increased by 417.38% from Year 2009 to 2010,increased by 314.6% from Year 2010 to 2011, and lastly, decreased by 74.13% from Year 2011 to 2012.
